summary_points: 1. As of July 31, 2025, American Express reported total U.S. Consumer and U.S. Small Business Card Member loans held for investment of $124.2 billion, with a 30-day delinquency rate of 1.3% for consumer loans and 1.6% for small business loans.

2.  The net write-off rate for U.S. Consumer Card Member loans decreased slightly from 2.1% in June 2025 to 2.0% in July 2025, while the rate for U.S. Small Business Card Member loans increased from 2.6% to 2.7% over the same period.
3. The American Express Credit Account Master Trust reported an annualized default rate of 1.1% as of July 31, 2025, which is lower than the 1.3% reported in June 2025.
1. Steel Dynamics, Inc. declared a $0.50 per common share cash dividend on August 14, 2025, payable October 10, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on September 30, 2025.
2.  The company is investing in aluminum operations to diversify its product offerings, aiming to supply aluminum flat rolled products to the beverage can, automotive, and industrial sectors.
3. No specific future impacts or risks were disclosed in this filing beyond general statements regarding business strategy.
1. Packaging Corporation of America (PCA) priced a $500 million offering of 5.200% Senior Notes due 2035 on August 11, 2025.
2. Net proceeds from the note offering are expected to be approximately $495.1 million, which, along with other funds, will finance PCA's acquisition of Greif, Inc.'s containerboard business.

3. Failure to consummate the Greif acquisition by June 30, 2026 (or any extension), or termination of the Greif Purchase Agreement before then, will require PCA to redeem the notes at 101% of their principal amount plus accrued interest.
1. On August 12, 2025, Equinix, Inc. elected Dr. Yanbing Li as an independent director to its Board of Directors, expanding the board to nine members.
2.  Dr. Li's appointment was not made pursuant to any prior agreements with third parties.
3. Dr. Li will receive Equinix's standard compensation for non-employee directors.
